title: The Reformation
brief_description: Explains the Reformation in terms of the Church, the cultural rebirth brought about by the Renaissance, the emergence of national states and the interpretation of the Scriptures. Special attention is devoted to Luther and the Protestant Reformation in Germany. No other credits available.
